meanings.definition: Make practical and effective use of.
meanings.sent1: She utilizes her time wisely by studying every day.
meanings.sent2: He utilizes his skills to help others in need.

meanings.sent4: The detective utilizes his keen observation skills to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The chef utilizes fresh ingredients to create delicious meals.
